EmailTemplate.subject: Bitesize Work Experience with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Want some Bitesize Work Experience in Feb half term?
Work alongside The Challenge's staff for half a day to help sign up partners to take part in the programme.
You will meet with one of the team who will take you through the meeting and potential outcomes. Learn how to book and run a meeting with a charity or professional partner before signing them up for the programme.
In order to help prepare you for Bitesize we have a presentation skills workshop taking place on Thursday 11th February, 5.30pm-7pm at Wolverhampton YMCA, 29-31 Temple Street, City Centre, Wolverhampton, WV2 4AN. You must come to the skills workshop in order to take part in Bitesize Work Experience.
The session will provide tips and strategy on how to give an effective presentation. The workshop will include information on:
Personal presentation and Interpersonal communication skills Presentation organisation Presentation material and the use of visual aids Presentation delivery method Coping with presentation nerves
Places are limited so please fill in the following form to your highest standard:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1crLdWAyK1hA0UCSh_3_PbW7qKvxyPeUEO_vRSvYxL1s/viewform
Have a great day,
Liam
